#summary How To Compile Build

= Introduction =

To build/compile oark is necessary the Visual Studio (we are using the 2008 version):

  * oark usermode:

      * Command line: Using the Visual Studio 2008 Command Prompt: %comspec% /k ""c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\vcvarsall.bat"" x86

Release:
C:\oark\oark_usermode>*msbuild /p:configuration=Release oark_usermode.sln*

Debug:
C:\oark\oark_usermode>*msbuild /p:configuration=Debug oark_usermode.sln*
